short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display an overlay showing your scroll progress percentage on any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scroll Percentage Indicator displays your current scroll position as a percentage. 

A sleek overlay window appears in the top-right corner of your browser, updating in real-time as you navigate through any webpage.

Whether you're reading long articles, browsing through forums, or coding with extensive documentation, Scroll Percentage Indicator provides a convenient reference to keep track of your scroll position.

How to Use:

→ Install the Extension: Add "Scroll Percentage Indicator" to your Chrome browser.
→ Start Scrolling: Visit any webpage and begin scrolling to see the overlay in action.
